---

I have successfully extracted the styles from `Components/Engineer/TestSequenceEditor.razor` into a new CSS file and linked it in `index.html`.

Here is a summary of the changes:
1.  **Created `wwwroot/css/test_sequence.css`**: This file now contains all the CSS rules that were previously in the `<style>` block of the Razor component.
2.  **Updated `Components/Engineer/TestSequenceEditor.razor`**: Removed the `<style>` block to clean up the component file.
3.  **Updated `wwwroot/index.html`**: Added a reference to the new CSS file:
    ```html
    <link href="css/test_sequence.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    ```
